articles.title: Man dies after being bitten by bat with "extremely rare" infection - Yahoo
articles.description: A man has died from an "extremely rare" rabies-like infection transmitted by a bat bite, Australian health officials said.
articles.content:
An Australian man has died from an "extremely rare" rabies-like infection transmitted by a bat bite, health officials said Thursday.
The man in his 50s was bitten by a bat carrying Australian bat ly… [+3542 chars]
